Post._content:
## svngit

gitersvner
* svn
* git

gitmastersvnmastermaster

git

- - -

<!-- more -->

## 

1. 
`git branch -a`

2. /
`git checkout <branch> [file] [-f]`
branch

3. 
`hint: Updates were rejected because the tip of your current branch is behind`
`hint: its remote counterpart. Integrate the remote changes (e.g.`
`hint: 'git pull ...') before pushing again.`
`hint: See the 'Note about fast-forwards' in 'git push --help' for details.`

`git pull`

`git push`

4. 
`git checkout -b <branch_name>`  
 branch 
`git branch -m <new_name>`
  

5. 
`git clone http://xxx.git`

`get clone git@xxx.git`

`git checkout -b <> <>`

6. 
`git fetch <remote base>`

7. 
`git branch <branch name>`

`git push <remote base> <local branch>:<remote branch>`

## 
### reset
`git reset [file]`


### remote


`git remote -v`
url

`git remote add <basename> <url>`


`git remote show <basename>`


`git remote rename <old basename> <new basename>`


### pull
fetchmerge

### push
`git push [remote_branch] [local_branch]`
svncommit

`git push <remote base> [tag name]`


`git push <remote base> <remote branch>:<local branch>`


`git push <remote base> --delete <remote branch>`


### tag


`git tag -l '[expression]'`


`git tag -a <tag name> -m <comment>`


`git tag -a <tag name> <md5>`


`git tag [tag name]`


### merge
`git merge <branch name>`


### commit
`git commit -a -m 'xx'`


### branch
`git branch`


`git branch -v`


`git branch -vv`


`git branch <branch name>`


`git branch -d <branch name>`


`git branch [--merged | --no-merged]`
|

`git branch -u <remote base>/<remote branch>`


### commit
`git commit -a -m 'xx'`


### checkout
`git checkout -- [file]`


`git checkout -b [branchname] [tagname]`


`git checkout -b [local branch] [remote base]/[remote branch]`


`git checkout --track <remote base>/<remote branch>`



`git checkout --track <remote base>/<remote branch>`
`git checkout -b <local branch> <remote base>/<remote branch>`


### rebase
`git rebase [basebranch]`


## 

### 
`git config -1`

### git push 
`git config --global push.default current`

### 
`git config --global alias.<name> <commend>`

`git config --global alias.st status`
`git config --global alias.cm "commit -m"`
`git config --global alias.ph "push origin <local_repository>:<remote_repository>"`

### 

#### http(s)
`git config --global credential.helper cache`
linux
`git config --global credential.helper wincred`
windows
#### sshssh  key

### 
.gitignore
`git rm --cached [file]`


[](http://git-scm.com/book/zh/v2)

[Hexo](https://hexo.io/zh-cn/) [Node.js](https://nodejs.org/en/) -

Hexo Hexo Jade, CoffeeScript Hexo Markdown Markdown Hexo [](https://hexo.io/zh-cn/docs/tag-plugins.html) Hexo Hexo [](https://hexo.io/themes/) [NexT](http://theme-next.iissnan.com/) ## Hexo [](https://neveryu.github.io/guestbook/) ### Hexo : > [Node.js](https://nodejs.org/en/) > [Git](http://git-scm.com/) npm Hexo ``` bash $ npm install -g hexo-cli ``` ### Git * Windows git Download Now * Mac [Homebrew](http://mxcl.github.com/homebrew/)[MacPorts](http://www.macports.org/) [](http://sourceforge.net/projects/git-osx-installer/) * LinuxUbuntuDebian`sudo apt-get install git-core` * LinuxFedoraRed HatCentOS`sudo yum install git-core` ### Node.js Node.js [nvm](https://github.com/creationix/nvm)nvmNode Version Manager windows nvm [nvm-windows](https://github.com/coreybutler/nvm-windows) nvm Download Now windowsnvm ``` bash $ nvm $ nvm install latest ``` `node -v` `Node.js`

`Node.js` Download Now

### Hexo Node.js npm Hexo ``` bash $ npm install -g hexo-cli ``` Hexo D blog `D:\blog` Hexo ``` bash $ hexo init ``` ``` . _config.yml package.json scaffolds source | _drafts | _posts ``` ``` bash $ hexo g $ hexo s --debug ``` Hexo `source` `_posts` `_` / Markdown HTML `public` `http://localhost:4000/` Hexo ![hexo-next-one-1](http://p1.bqimg.com/567571/27324b740c9e91e2.png) NexT == #### NexT Git checkout ``` bash $ git clone https://github.com/iissnan/hexo-theme-next themes/next ```

Hexo _config.yml Hexo

#### NexT `theme` `next` NexT `hexo clean` Hexo #### Hexo `--debug` `hexo s --debug` `INFO Hexo is running at http://0.0.0.0:4000/. Press Ctrl+C to stop.` `http://localhost:4000/`

NexT NexT Scheme Muse

![hexo-next-one-1](http://p1.bqimg.com/567571/8333728b5eaab526.png) NexT

[Hexo](https://hexo.io/zh-cn/) [NexT](http://theme-next.iissnan.com/) .

### ``` bash $ hexo clean $ hexo g $ hexo s --debug ``` debug ### ``` bash $ hexo clean $ hexo g $ hexo d ``` deploy ### ``` bash $ hexo new "postName" # $ hexo new page "pageName" # $ hexo generate # public $ hexo server # (4000'ctrl+c'server) $ hexo deploy # $ hexo help # $ hexo version # Hexo ``` ### ``` bash $ hexo new == hexo n $ hexo generate == hexo g $ hexo server == hexo s $ hexo deploy == hexo d ``` ### 1 hexo ``` author:Neveryu email:react.dong.yu@gmail.com language:zh-CN ``` ``` author: Neveryu email: react.dong.yu@gmail.com language: zh-CN ``` ### 2 GitEmail ``` git config --global user.name "Your name" git config --global user.email "Your email" ``` ### 3 Hexo [Font Awesome](http://fontawesome.io/) Font Awesome Font Awesome `` `` ``
